Docs.summary: Represents a that is published in the editing context and that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[wf2](../../add/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer is in a read-only state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual elements can bind to this property in order to provide different behavior in a read-only state (such as the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox> disallowing edits and setting the state to “Disabled”). If a hosting application would like to set the designer to a read-only state, this <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> can be retrieved and can be set to `false`.
